subtitleNullable: A dataset with code to rename the class
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is referenced from 2 articles [1] and [2]. It consists of 2 sets of *train set* and *test set*. The train set contains 100 classes with 50,000 samples and the test set contains 100 classes and 10,000 samples.

I've added a snippet of code to be able to change the names of the classes to something more familiar. You can refer to the *preprocess.py* file to learn more about this.

*map_clsloc.txt* from [here](https://github.com/Evolving-AI-Lab/ppgn/blob/master/misc/map_clsloc.txt) to serve for renaming the class.

Folder structure of train set and test set before changing the class name
│   ├── miniimagenet
│   │   ├── train
│   │   │   ├── n01440764
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   ├── n01443537
│   │   │   ├── ...
...
Folder structure of train set and test set after changing the class name
│   ├── miniimagenet
│   │   ├── train
│   │   │   ├── African_hunting_dog
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   │   ├── ...PEG
│   │   │   ├── aircraft_carrier
│   │   │   ├── ...
...

[[1] Mengye Ren, Eleni Triantafillou, Sachin Ravi, Jake Snell and Kevin Swersky,Joshua B. Tenenbaum,Hugo Larochelle, Richard S. Zemel. Meta-Learning for Semi-Supervised Few-Shot Classification. *Proceedings of 6th International Conference on Learning Representations*, 2018.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1803.00676.pdf)
[[2] Olga Russakovsky, Jia Deng, Hao Su, Jonathan Krause, Sanjeev Satheesh, Sean Ma, Zhiheng Huang, Andrej Karpathy, Aditya Khosla, Michael Bernstein, Alexander C. Berg, Li Fei-Fei. *ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Challenge. International Journal of Computer Vision*, 2015.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1409.0575.pdf)
title: MiniImageNet
subtitle: A dataset with code to rename the class
description:
This dataset is referenced from 2 articles [1] and [2]. It consists of 2 sets of *train set* and *test set*. The train set contains 100 classes with 50,000 samples and the test set contains 100 classes and 10,000 samples.

I've added a snippet of code to be able to change the names of the classes to something more familiar. You can refer to the *preprocess.py* file to learn more about this.

*map_clsloc.txt* from [here](https://github.com/Evolving-AI-Lab/ppgn/blob/master/misc/map_clsloc.txt) to serve for renaming the class.

Folder structure of train set and test set before changing the class name
│   ├── miniimagenet
│   │   ├── train
│   │   │   ├── n01440764
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   ├── n01443537
│   │   │   ├── ...
...
Folder structure of train set and test set after changing the class name
│   ├── miniimagenet
│   │   ├── train
│   │   │   ├── African_hunting_dog
│   │   │   │   ├── ...JPEG
│   │   │   │   ├── ...PEG
│   │   │   ├── aircraft_carrier
│   │   │   ├── ...
...

[[1] Mengye Ren, Eleni Triantafillou, Sachin Ravi, Jake Snell and Kevin Swersky,Joshua B. Tenenbaum,Hugo Larochelle, Richard S. Zemel. Meta-Learning for Semi-Supervised Few-Shot Classification. *Proceedings of 6th International Conference on Learning Representations*, 2018.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1803.00676.pdf)
[[2] Olga Russakovsky, Jia Deng, Hao Su, Jonathan Krause, Sanjeev Satheesh, Sean Ma, Zhiheng Huang, Andrej Karpathy, Aditya Khosla, Michael Bernstein, Alexander C. Berg, Li Fei-Fei. *ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Challenge. International Journal of Computer Vision*, 2015.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1409.0575.pdf)
